SEARCH
Package de.fherfurt.lat.api.services

Klasse StudioService

java.lang.Object
de.fherfurt.lat.api.services.StudioService
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
IStudioService
public class StudioService extends Object implements IStudioService
Service class for managing studio entities.

This class implements the IStudioService interface, providing the actual functionality for retrieving, adding, and deleting studios. It interacts with the IStudioRepository to perform CRUD operations on studio data.

  • Konstruktorübersicht

    Konstruktoren
    Konstruktor
    Beschreibung
    StudioService()
    Default constructor that initializes the service with the studio repository obtained from the DataController.
    StudioService(IStudioRepository studioRepository)
    Constructor that allows for dependency injection of the studio repository.

    • StudioService

  • Methodendetails

    • getAllStudios

      public List<Studio> getAllStudios()
      Retrieves a list of all studios.

      This method fetches all studio records from the data source.

      Angegeben von:
      getAllStudios in Schnittstelle IStudioService
      Gibt zurück:
      a List of Studio objects representing all studios.

    • getStudioById

      public Optional<Studio> getStudioById(int studioId)
      Retrieves a specific studio by its ID.

      This method fetches a studio record by its unique ID from the data source.

      Angegeben von:
      getStudioById in Schnittstelle IStudioService
      Parameter:
      studioId - the ID of the studio to retrieve.
      Gibt zurück:
      an Optional containing the Studio if found, or an empty Optional if not found.

    • addStudio

      public boolean addStudio(Studio studio)
      Adds a new studio.

      This method creates a new studio record in the data source.

      Angegeben von:
      addStudio in Schnittstelle IStudioService
      Parameter:
      studio - the Studio to be added.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the studio was successfully created, false otherwise.

    • deleteStudio

      public boolean deleteStudio(int studioId)
      Deletes a specific studio by its ID.

      This method removes a studio record from the data source based on its unique ID.

      Angegeben von:
      deleteStudio in Schnittstelle IStudioService
      Parameter:
      studioId - the ID of the studio to be deleted.
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the studio was successfully deleted, false otherwise.
